events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The customer's request mentioning refund and wrong item has been categorized under the Refund cluster for processing.
Assigning the case to a customer support agent specialized in refund issues for further assistance.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed?
Sure, my order number is 789654123 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product I received.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick help, I appreciate the prompt response and resolution offered for my refund.
We have confirmed the refund initiation and consider this issue resolved. Please contact us if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if everything was processed to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now as the refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported.
